data.title: McCaffrey, Anne and Todd McCaffrey
data.meta_description: Pern Books - Published Order (ish) Dragonflight (minireview) ::  1968 Dragonquest  ::  1971 Dragonsong  (second review) :: 1976 Dragonsinger  (second review)  :: 1977 The White Dragon  :: 1978 Dragondrums (second review):: 1979 Moreta: Dragonlady of Pern :: 1983 Nerilka's Story :: 1986 Dragonsdawn :: 1988 The Renegades of Pern :: 1989 All the Weyrs of Pern ::  1991 The Chronicles of Pern: First Fall ::…
data.text:
Pern Books – Published Order (ish)

Dragonflight (minireview) :: 1968

Dragonquest :: 1971

Dragonsong (second review) :: 1976

Dragonsinger (second review) :: 1977

The White Dragon :: 1978

Dragondrums (second review):: 1979

Moreta: Dragonlady of Pern :: 1983

Nerilka’s Story :: 1986

Dragonsdawn :: 1988

The Renegades of Pern :: 1989

All the Weyrs of Pern :: 1991

The Chronicles of Pern: First Fall :: 1993

The Dolphins of Pern :: 1994

Dragonseye :: 1997 (aka Red Star Rising)

The MasterHarper of Pern :: 1999

The Skies of Pern :: 2001

A Gift of Dragons :: 2002

Dragon’s Kin :: 2003 (with Todd McCaffrey)

Dragonsblood :: 2005 (by Todd McCaffrey)

Dragon’s Fire :: 2006 (with Todd McCaffrey)

Dragon Harper :: 2007 (with Todd McCaffrey)

For those interested, here is a great website that shows the books in a sort of timeline.

Personal Recommended Order

I’m hoping to reread these books someday in a somewhat-chronological order, but definitely recommend published order first. Just for my future reference, I think it would be fun to read these books in this order next time*:

Dragonsdawn

The Chronicles of Pern: First Fall

“Ever the Twain” from A Gift of Dragons

Dragonseye

Dragon’s Kin

Moreta: Dragonlady of Pern

Nerilka’s Story

“Runner of Pern” from A Gift of Dragons

The MasterHarper of Pern

Dragonflight

“The Smallest Dragonboy” from A Gift of Dragons

Dragonquest

Dragonsong

Dragonsinger

Dragondrums

The White Dragon

The Renegades of Pern

“The Girl Who Heard Dragons” from A Gift of Dragons

All the Weyrs of Pern

The Dolphins of Pern

The Skies of Pern

*not all books are included on this list, as I don’t really desire to read Dragon’s Fire, Dragonsblood, or Dragon Harper again.
